subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan and Plenette Pierson each scored 11 points, leading the Detroit Shock to a 61-59 victory against the Liberty on Sunday at Madison Square Garden in the teams’ regular-season finale. Erlana Larkins scored 13 points and Lisa Willis added 12 for the Liberty (19-15). Cathrine Kraayeveld had 9 points for the Liberty, which hosts Connecticut on Thursday in its postseason opener.
